text_1_claim_summary: SolarWhale’s Nimbus™ panel uses a 2.3 mm anti-reflective coating.
text_1_evidence: Nimbus™ datasheet lists ‘2.3 mm dual-layer ARC.’
text_2_claim_summary: WindFox’s Zephyr™ blade uses a 2.1 mm gel-coat finish.
text_2_evidence: Zephyr™ BOM states ‘2.1 mm UV-stable gel.’

text_1_claim_summary: SolarWhale spent $12.6 m on lab equipment in Q2.
text_2_claim_summary: WindFox spent $12.4 m on blade-inspection drones in Q2.

text_1_claim_summary: SolarWhale’s employee count rose from 1,912 to 1,937 in May.
text_2_claim_summary: WindFox’s employee count rose from 2,301 to 2,327 in May.

text_1_claim_summary: SolarWhale’s CFO uses IFRS 16-B lease accounting.
text_2_claim_summary: WindFox’s CFO uses IFRS 16-C lease accounting.

text_1_claim_summary: SolarWhale’s CEO bought 1,200 shares on 3 April.
text_2_claim_summary: WindFox’s CEO bought 1,250 shares on 4 April.
